file.name: ghes-2.19.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: GitHub v3 REST API
  description: GitHub's v3 REST API.
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://help.github.com/articles/github-terms-of-service/
  contact:
    name: Support
    url: https://support.github.com
tags:
- name: actions
  description: Endpoints to manage GitHub Actions using the REST API.
  x-displayName: GitHub Actions
- name: activity
  description: Activity APIs provide access to notifications, subscriptions, and timelines.
  x-displayName: Activity
- name: apps
  description: Information for integrations and installations.
  x-displayName: GitHub Apps
- name: billing
  description: Monitor charges and usage from Actions and Packages.
  x-displayName: Billing
- name: checks
  description: Rich interactions with checks run by your integrations.
  x-displayName: Checks
- name: code-scanning
  description: Retrieve code scanning alerts from a repository.
  x-displayName: Code Scanning
- name: codes-of-conduct
  description: Insight into codes of conduct for your communities.
  x-displayName: Codes of Conduct
- name: emojis
  description: List emojis available to use on GitHub.
  x-displayName: Emojis
- name: gists
  description: View, modify your gists.
  x-displayName: Gists
- name: git
  description: Raw Git functionality.
  x-displayName: Git Database
- name: gitignore
  description: View gitignore templates
  x-displayName: Gitignore
- name: interactions
  description: Owner or admin management of users interactons.
  x-displayName: Interactions
- name: issues
  description: Interact with GitHub Issues.
  x-displayName: Issues
- name: licenses
  description: View various OSS licenses.
  x-displayName: Licenses
- name: markdown
  description: Render Github flavored markdown
  x-displayName: Markdown
- name: meta
  description: Endpoints that give information about the API.
  x-displayName: Meta
- name: migrations
  description: Move projects to or from GitHub.
  x-displayName: Migrations
- name: oauth-authorizations
  description: Manage access of OAuth applications
  x-displayName: Oauth Authorizations
- name: orgs
  description: Interact with GitHub Orgs.
  x-displayName: Organizations
- name: projects
  description: Interact with GitHub Projects.
  x-displayName: Projects
- name: pulls
  description: Interact with GitHub Pull Requests.
  x-displayName: Pull Requests
- name: rate-limit
  description: Check your current rate limit status
  x-displayName: Rate Limit
- name: reactions
  description: Interact with reactions to various GitHub entities.
  x-displayName: Reactions
- name: repos
  description: Interact with GitHub Repos.
  x-displayName: Repositories
- name: scim
  description: Provisioning of GitHub organization membership for SCIM-enabled providers.
  x-displayName: SCIM
- name: search
  description: Look for stuff on GitHub.
  x-displayName: Search
- name: teams
  description: Interact with GitHub Teams.
  x-displayName: Teams
- name: users
  description: Interact with and view information about users and also current user.
  x-displayName: Users
servers:
- url: http://{hostname}
  variables:
    hostname:
      description: Self-hosted Enterprise Server or Enterprise Cloud hostname
      default: HOSTNAME
externalDocs:
  description: GitHub Enterprise Developer Docs
  url: https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.19/v3/
paths:
  "/orgs/{org}/repos":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-for-org.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-in-org.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/teams":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-team-access-restrictions.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/set-team-access-restrictions.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/add-team-access-restrictions.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-teams-with-access-to-protected-branch.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{commit_sha}/branches-where-head":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-branches-for-head-commit.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}":
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-release-asset.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-release-asset.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-release-asset.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/required_status_checks/contexts":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-status-check-contexts.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/set-status-check-contexts.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-all-status-check-contexts.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/add-status-check-contexts.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-content.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-or-update-file-contents.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-file.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/topics":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-all-topics.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/replace-all-topics.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/vulnerability-alerts":
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/enable-vulnerability-alerts.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/disable-vulnerability-alerts.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/deployments":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-deployment.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-deployments.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pages":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-pages-site.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-pages-site.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-pages.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-information-about-pages-site.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/required_pull_request_reviews":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-pull-request-review-protection.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-pull-request-review-protection.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-pull-request-review-protection.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{ref}/statuses":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-commit-statuses-for-ref.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/compare/{base}...{head}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/compare-commits.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{commit_sha}/pulls":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-pull-requests-associated-with-commit.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/enforce_admins":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-admin-branch-protection.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-admin-branch-protection.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/set-admin-branch-protection.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/deployments/{deployment_id}/statuses/{status_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-deployment-status.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/required_signatures":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-commit-signature-protection.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-commit-signature-protection.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-commit-signature-protection.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-user-access-restrictions.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/set-user-access-restrictions.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/add-user-access-restrictions.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-users-with-access-to-protected-branch.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/deployments/{deployment_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-deployment.yaml
  "/repositories":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-public.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-branches.yaml
  "/user/repository_invitations":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-invitations-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-branch.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-deploy-keys.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-deploy-key.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pages/builds/{build_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-pages-build.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/hooks/{hook_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-webhook.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-webhook.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-webhook.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-releases.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-release.yaml
  "/repos/{template_owner}/{template_repo}/generate":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-using-template.yaml
  "/users/{username}/repos":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-for-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/required_status_checks":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-status-check-protection.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-status-check-protection.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-status-checks-protection.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-access-restrictions.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-access-restrictions.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys/{key_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-deploy-key.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-deploy-key.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}":
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-release.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-release.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-release.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-branch-protection.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-branch-protection.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-branch-protection.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/invitations":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-invitations.yaml
  "/user/repository_invitations/{invitation_id}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/decline-invitation.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/accept-invitation.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/hooks/{hook_id}/pings":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/ping-webhook.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/tags":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-tags.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/teams":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-teams.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/commit_activity":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-commit-activity-stats.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/languages":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-languages.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/punch_card":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-punch-card-stats.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/transfer":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/transfer.yaml
  "/user/repos":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pages/builds":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/request-pages-build.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-pages-builds.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-collaborator.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/check-collaborator.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/add-collaborator.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/forks":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-fork.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-forks.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}/assets":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/upload-release-asset.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-release-assets.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-commit-comment.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-commit-comment.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-commit-comment.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/hooks/{hook_id}/tests":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/test-push-webhook.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/hooks":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-webhooks.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-webhook.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pages/builds/latest":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-latest-pages-build.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{commit_sha}/comments":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-commit-comment.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-comments-for-commit.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/participation":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-participation-stats.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-commits.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/apps":
    put:
      "$ref": operations/repos/set-app-access-restrictions.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/add-app-access-restrictions.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-apps-with-access-to-protected-branch.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/remove-app-access-restrictions.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/tags/{tag}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-release-by-tag.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/zipball/{ref}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/download-zipball-archive.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/invitations/{invitation_id}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/repos/delete-invitation.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/repos/update-invitation.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{ref}/status":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-combined-status-for-ref.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/statuses/{sha}":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-commit-status.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/deployments/{deployment_id}/statuses":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/create-deployment-status.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-deployment-statuses.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/tarball/{ref}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/download-tarball-archive.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/contributors":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-contributors-stats.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/readme":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-readme.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-commit-comments-for-repo.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{ref}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-commit.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/latest":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-latest-release.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/code_frequency":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-code-frequency-stats.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/contributors":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-contributors.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/list-collaborators.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/merges":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/repos/merge.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}/permission":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/repos/get-collaborator-permission-level.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/license":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/licenses/get-for-repo.yaml
  "/licenses/{license}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/licenses/get.yaml
  "/licenses":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/licenses/get-all-commonly-used.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/subscription":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/get-repo-subscription.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/activity/set-repo-subscription.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/activity/delete-repo-subscription.yaml
  "/networks/{owner}/{repo}/events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-public-events-for-repo-network.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-repo-events.yaml
  "/events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-public-events.yaml
  "/user/starred/{owner}/{repo}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/activity/unstar-repo-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/activity/star-repo-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/check-repo-is-starred-by-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/users/{username}/events/public":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-public-events-for-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/notifications":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-repo-notifications-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/activity/mark-repo-notifications-as-read.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/subscribers":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-watchers-for-repo.yaml
  "/users/{username}/events/orgs/{org}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-org-events-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/orgs/{org}/events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-public-org-events.yaml
  "/feeds":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/get-feeds.yaml
  "/users/{username}/received_events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-received-events-for-user.yaml
  "/users/{username}/starred":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-repos-starred-by-user.yaml
  "/users/{username}/subscriptions":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-repos-watched-by-user.yaml
  "/notifications/threads/{thread_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/get-thread.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/activity/mark-thread-as-read.yaml
  "/notifications/threads/{thread_id}/subscription":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/get-thread-subscription-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/activity/delete-thread-subscription.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/activity/set-thread-subscription.yaml
  "/users/{username}/events":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-events-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/notifications":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-notifications-for-authenticated-user.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/activity/mark-notifications-as-read.yaml
  "/user/subscriptions":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-watched-repos-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/user/starred":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-repos-starred-by-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/stargazers":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-stargazers-for-repo.yaml
  "/users/{username}/received_events/public":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/activity/list-received-public-events-for-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-runs/{check_run_id}/annotations":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/list-annotations.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{ref}/check-suites":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/list-suites-for-ref.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{ref}/check-runs":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/list-for-ref.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-suites/{check_suite_id}/check-runs":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/list-for-suite.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-runs/{check_run_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/get.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/checks/update.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-suites":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/checks/create-suite.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-suites/{check_suite_id}/rerequest":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/checks/rerequest-suite.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-suites/preferences":
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/checks/set-suites-preferences.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-runs":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/checks/create.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/check-suites/{check_suite_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/checks/get-suite.yaml
  "/markdown":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/markdown/render.yaml
  "/markdown/raw":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/markdown/render-raw.yaml
  "/orgs/{org}/projects":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-for-org.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/create-for-org.yaml
  "/projects/columns/{column_id}/moves":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/move-column.yaml
  "/projects/columns/cards/{card_id}":
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/projects/update-card.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/get-card.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/projects/delete-card.yaml
  "/projects/columns/{column_id}":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/get-column.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/projects/update-column.yaml
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/projects/delete-column.yaml
  "/users/{username}/projects":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-for-user.yaml
  "/projects/{project_id}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/projects/delete.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/get.yaml
    patch:
      "$ref": operations/projects/update.yaml
  "/projects/{project_id}/columns":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-columns.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/create-column.yaml
  "/projects/columns/{column_id}/cards":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/create-card.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-cards.yaml
  "/user/projects":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/create-for-authenticated-user.yaml
  "/projects/{project_id}/collaborators/{username}":
    delete:
      "$ref": operations/projects/remove-collaborator.yaml
    put:
      "$ref": operations/projects/add-collaborator.yaml
  "/projects/{project_id}/collaborators/{username}/permission":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/get-permission-for-user.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/projects":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/create-for-repo.yaml
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-for-repo.yaml
  "/projects/columns/cards/{card_id}/moves":
    post:
      "$ref": operations/projects/move-card.yaml
  "/projects/{project_id}/collaborators":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/projects/list-collaborators.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/comments/{comment_id}/reactions":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/list-for-issue-comment.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/create-for-issue-comment.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{issue_number}/reactions":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/list-for-issue.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/create-for-issue.yaml
  "/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pulls/comments/{comment_id}/reactions":
    get:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/list-for-pull-request-review-comment.yaml
    post:
      "$ref": operations/reactions/create-for-pull-request-review-comment.yaml
  "/teams/{team_id}/discussions/{discussion_number}/reactions":
    post:
